Player History
Drafted in Rule 5 Draft, 1st round, by Atlanta in 2014...
Earned first career win on 4/25/2014...
1/30/2015: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,222,857 through salary arbitration...
Had first career hit on 7/6/2015, off Trey Masek (CHC)...
1/30/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,222,857 through salary arbitration...
1/30/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,222,857 through salary arbitration...
9/21/2017: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $960,000 per year, for 3 years.
Traded from Atlanta to Chicago (N) on 5/21/2019 (Going to CHC: P Zach Jones. Going to ATL: DH Eric Weibel)...
Injured on 8/8/2019 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Miami on 7/23/2020 (Going to CHC: LF Joshua Raht. Going to MIA: P Zach Jones)...
9/1/2020: Signed a contract extension with Miami, $500,000 per year, for 2 years.
Traded from Miami to Kansas City on 3/2/2023 (Going to KC: P Zach Jones. Going to MIA: 3B Harold Martinez)...
Signed as a free agent by Washington on 2/2/2025 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/5/2027 to a 2-year deal worth $1,550,000 per year...
